decision_conditions: The proposed plans indicate amendments which would result in an increase in the built form and a change in the design and appearance of the development and would breach condition 4 of the original planning permission. The proposed changes cannot be considered as non-material as they represent a form of development beyond the scope of the planning approval. The potential impacts therefore need to be considered as part of a new planning application.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 59235/APP/2023/1794, dated 07-11-23 (Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include 4 side dormers, 1 side roof light and new rear facing window. Erection of single storey rear extension following demolition of existing conservatory and amendments to fenestration.) to amend fenestrations and dormers.
